column1: Little Goat Diner////The one downside was my entree came out 15 + mins (not an exaggeration) before my friends.  The server was great the whole time and incredibly apologetic
column2: and we had two managers stop by and apologize as well.  Both entrees when they did arrive were wonderful
column3: Little goat has a knack for combining strange ingredients in unique (and delicious) new ways.  Since all the food when it came out was incredible
column4: they gave us a round of drinks on them instead.
